column7: Seminar on interdisciplinary topics in the natural sciences, social sciences, humanities, and arts. Open to Chancellor's Scholars and other honors students. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. May be repeated to a maximum of 6 hours if topics vary. Prerequisite: Junior standing in the Campus Honors Program.
